price: Dájúdájú Olúwa rẹ, Ó nímọ̀ jùlọ nípa ẹni tó ṣìnà kúrò lójú ọ̀nà Rẹ̀. Ó sì nímọ̀ jùlọ nípa àwọn olùmọ̀nà.
arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِٱلۡمُهۡتَدِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: inna rabbaka huwa aʿlamu biman ḍalla ʿan sabīlihi wahuwa aʿlamu bil-muh'tadīna
